reviews.review: I mean, the game is good. It's pretty old though, and there is a lot of trashy servers. There are some nice ones, but don't really expect to play the game as it is really supposed to be played. You can play with bots or friends though. Also, you can just get it for GMod.
all the servers you join nowadays have fake players in them

It's Counter-Strike, aha. To be honest I have never really got into these titles but i'm gonna try again. This i got for free a long with CSGO and it is a decent game. As i'm not keen on CSGO i thought this was gonna be point less but to be honest i actually liked it. That's why i'm going to give CSGO another try, aha.

As CS Source released in 2004 i'm surprised i was getting into matches but i guess i have to realize how popular these games are. It looks fine, plays well and it's about what you would expect for an older CS game.

I was getting into matches but a lot of them i left due to it being heavily modded. The one i was in for near enough the whole playtime was the well known Office map and surprisingly manged to do quite decent, aha. But just like other game titles and especially these kind you get people being quite toxic and mardy. As i was popping off in the round i was getting comments like "Well Obviously he's cheating." Or "Are you a clean player." It is what it is but IT'S IRRITATING!

+Pros
+Looks decent for a 2004 title, aha. (I understand people aren't really bothered but it's a plus in my book.)
+A Fun, classic shooter.
+Still Surprisingly popular for a game what came out 16+ Years ago.

-Cons
-Quite Toxic playerbase.
-Difficult to get some what normal servers.

Overall rating *6.5/10* A decent shooter still popping off 16+ years later and must try for CSGO fans. This is how CSGO Began and now it makes me want to try CSGO Again, aha.
Although this game is pretty good, It's player base is decreasing by the day, and it's mostly used for Garry's Mod.
One of the classics! I've been into a wonderful community back then!
flying scoutsman was the one and only reason i bought this game.
Russian man yelled at me for not clutching a 1v6 with a Glock 10/10

its amazing that people still play this game to this day
i played a few times and i have concluded that normal is too easy for me and hard is too difficult... still fun
10/10 a good game and a game you need for gmod

I played this on PC. Counter-Strike: Source (CS:S) is a great remake of the classic FPS Counter-Strike. CS:S has better graphics and sound, as well as adding a new maps. CS:S is a fantastic team-based shooter where one team wants to plant a bomb while the other team wants to stop the other team (There are more gamemodes). If you want to play a good Counter-Strike game I would recommend Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS:GO). Since CS:GO has more players, maps, and it is free. But CS:S is still great fun. I give CS:S a 8.5/10. Almost a masterpiece.

For a Counter-Strike game, this is one of the best MP Valve games ever made. I literally got it yesterday, but I know that so many people have made great memory's on this game, mapping or playing. I recommend this game 99.99%. the other 00.01 percent is off of the shit tryhards.
